Reviews.Title: Nice clear color picture.
Reviews.Author: Jerry G. Parish
Reviews.Content: The monitors provide a nice picture but the two attachment fixtures are poorly made.  I could not get the monitor to mount using the provided attachments.  They are flimsy and do not adjust easily.  I used hot glue to attach the monitor to the dash.  So far, I really like the color picture and it is surprisingly clear.  I have not tried them at night yet.

ProductInfo.Features:
5" digital color TFT LCD monitor
2 ways to install it
High-resolution picture
the monitor will start up automatically
ProductInfo.Name: 5 Inch TFT LCD Car Color Rear View Monitor Parking Backup Camera DVD + 2 Bracket
